events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
An agent specialized in refunds has been assigned to handle this customer's case to ensure a smooth resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like a refund, and Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item did not match the description on the website and I want to return it.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the item.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund process. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the return label.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and if there is anything else we can assist you with during the refund process.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
